name: Pizza'Matic 5000
description:
GREETINGS, NEW EMPLOYEE
WELCOME TO THE GREATEST AUTOMATIC PIZZA MAKING FACILITY - [TRAINING PROGRAM]

HERE YOU WILL MAKE PIZZA. YOU WILL MAKE IT ACCORDING TO THE CUSTOMER'S ORDER AND YOU WILL GIVE THEM THE PIZZA WHEN IT IS COMPLETE. YOU ARE TIMED. INGREDIENTS ARE LIMITLESS. MAKE. PIZZA.

  • Left click - Pick up
  • Right click - Throw
  • WASD - Move

Check the order -> prepare the ingredients -> make the pizza -> cook it last -> serve it to the customer.

Enjoy!

My entry for the LD40 Compo.
Made in <48 hours using the Unreal Engine, 3DS Max, Photoshop, Illustrator, Audacity and Chiptone.
